context: I failed to address your concerns promptly
letter:
Dear [Client's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to sincerely apologize for not addressing your concerns promptly. I understand how important it is for you to feel heard and valued, and I regret any frustration my delay may have caused you.

Your feedback is vital to us, and I take full responsibility for not responding in a timely manner. I appreciate your patience and understand that this may have led to uncertainty in our collaboration. Please know that I am committed to ensuring that your needs are met and that this will not happen again in the future.

If there are any further concerns or issues you would like to discuss, I am here to listen and assist in any way I can. Thank you for your understanding and for the opportunity to make things right.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Company]  
[Your Contact Information]
